fields.description:
Indgila Samad Ali is a graphic designer and art-director currently based in Moscow, Russia. She is focusing on pushing the boundaries in branding and creating graphic identities through developing generous but rational visual languages for different clients whether it’s cultural or corporate, non-profit or medical, art or technology. She is thourough in her proccesses with a competence in strategies yet mainly focused on depth research and analysis as well as developing the concept and design.


She worked with such clients as: Ministry of Culture of the Russian Federation, State Tretyakov Gallery, Moscow State Museum of Cinema, Rostech, PIK Group, Sogaz, Oktava Factory, Lexus, Moscow Metro, Machine Tool Museum, INDG Holland, Forkhead BioTherapeutics New York, GetPure INC, The Latvian Museum of Contemporary Art and others.


She has been exhibiting on both national and international levels at Moscow International House of Music, Gogol`s house, Solyanka VPA, Moscow Manege, Ground Zine Fest, Viennacontemporary, Ballery Berlin and others.
